verbose_text: Moreover, progerin expression decreased the levels of the nuclear-architecture-associated proteins lamin B1 and lamina associated polypeptide2 (LAP2), and the extent of heterochromatin associated trimethylation of lysine 27 on histone 3 (H3K27me3); but increased the expression of serine 139 phosphorylated H2AX (gammaH2AX) and the proportion of SA-beta-gal positive cells.
